page.title: 05New population and Attitudes
page.content: There are aproximately 330 people over 18 in Sampford Courtney village and the surrounding area.The village Post Office pays out nearly seventy old age Pensions and only eleven Family allowances. Sampford,as one of the areas 'pretty villages' is not a cheap place to buy a house or to live.As cottages come onto the market,or are converted from old farm buildings,they are usually bought by retired people.These people like the village as it is,and as it is also a conservation area,anybody wanting to alter anything structural will find'the village' against the proposals.There are very few of the original families left.However,the majority of the inhabitants are very eager to help with 'Village activities'such as Britain in Bloom comp. and the Church Fete.
